name: LoFiLaunch
description:
LO-FI LAUNCH is an endless, challenging shooter inspired in gameplay by the Coin Launcher minigame from Super Smash Bros. Brawl, and aesthetically by classics such as Space Invaders, Galaga and so forth. Constantly shoot against each enemy to get more points against a progressively higher difficulty. Stay alive for as long as possible to be the best!

Audio credits: (all Freesound.org):

https://freesound.org/people/SamplingSamTheMarylandMan/sounds/475547/

https://freesound.org/people/timgormly/sounds/170161/
